settings.title: How To Purchase Our Products
settings.subtitle: We are now opening up SOSense as a pre-order BETA product.
settings.text: Earlybird purchases will help us complete the development of this life-saving alarm system that we have put years of research into creating because we know this is what the world needs to save precious lives.
settings.text_second: As an early adopter, you will also gain a free upgrade from your BETA product to the final product as soon as this is released.
